function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of accurate data on urban forest composition and health","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate modeling of project impacts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid adoption of 5g model without thorough impact assessment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate policy and law formulation in urban planning due to lack of consideration for digital fluency and digital rich environments","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on old-school drawing culture and impersonal autocad representations due to contemporary addiction to digital narrative rich television shows and movies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential limitations in using 5g and 6g technologies for telemedicine, teleworking, and real-time communication in health sector","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on remote working and xr technology may lead to decreased social interaction and community cohesion, increasing the risk of mental health issues and social isolation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The use of xr technology and virtual environments could lead to decreased physical activity and an associated increase in sedentary behavior, leading to health issues.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased adoption of xr technology may lead to cybersecurity risks and potential exposure to virtual threats, impacting data privacy and security.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through increased physical interactions in urban areas and cities due to the use of xr technology.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through shared holographic displays","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased risk of infection due to crowded spaces around holographic displays","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of virus transmission through shared touch surfaces on holographic display interfaces","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of high fidelity mobile holographic capability may lead to increased physical interaction and close proximity among individuals, potentially facilitating the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integration of ai and big data in creating super datasets for urban fabrics may lead to data privacy and security risks, potentially exposing sensitive information to unauthorized individuals or entities.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased physical interaction in urban spaces and events.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate technological infrastructure for 6g and smart cities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Remodelling and re-engineering of networks and systems across cities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Creation of new types of devices leading to obsolescence of existing ones","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in achieving supportive infrastructures for 6g technology","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cost implications and extensive upgrades for existing networks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift towards less face-to-face human interactions due to the outbreak of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid shift to digital technology in architecture education","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Globalization of design studios and classes","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of different computing technologies in future cities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Slowdown in technology advancements due to covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased reliance on smart wireless devices in urban areas","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Optimization of resource consumption in urban areas through big data and computational technologies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Prolonged existence of the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Second/third wave of the pandemic in cities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Historical reference to the spanish flu pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contagious disease propagation in urban areas","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Financial subsidies may lead to an increase in the production and distribution of iot devices, potentially increasing the risk of disease transmission through contaminated devices.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Introduction of new technologies such as 6g, iot, and immersive xr may lead to an expansion of cashless economies, potentially influencing the spread of contagious diseases through the handling of cashless payments.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The increased reliance on online schooling and work-at-home programs may result in prolonged close contact among individuals, leading to a higher risk of disease transmission in these settings.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limitation of infrastructural capacity for 6g wireless technology due to scope","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Compatibility issues with 6g devices and sensors","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented energy consumption and high cost of energy-efficient devices","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cost of implementing 6g technology","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ethical and moral drones and robots for delivering medical supplies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased data sharing due to technological frameworks like 6g","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid increase in data generation from various technologies like ai, crowd computing, ar, and 5g","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Digital inequality in cities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in 5g
